document_data.name: Karrik
document_data.mainbody: '''Karrik''' was a warrior and treasure hunter in the [[Moonwood]] ''circa'' the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Karrik was gruff, dour, and greedy. He disliked taking unnecessary risks.
document_data.History: In [[1484 DR]], Karrik and his companions [[Lisstra]], [[Dran]], and [[Garn (Dran's brother)|Garn]] decided to explore the ruins of [[Methegrist]].
